headline: WILD MANUAL SEMI-AUTOMATIC CAMERA SYSTEM
description: Manual/Semi-automatic Camera System    Currently configured for Polaroid 4 x 5 photos, but may be used for 35mm photography with appropriate accessories.
keywords: controls polaroid ccd 35mm adaptor wild zeiss
